analysis.description:
TieredPriceCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#613-632) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTimeTier2 > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#618-620)

TieredPriceCrowdsale._getbonusRate (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#632-656) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _tier4Start > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#647-656)
	- _tier3Start > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#642-656)
	- _tier2Start > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#638-656)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#977-986) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#980-981)

TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#1004-1009) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#1006-1009)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#1016-1023) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#1023)
Parameter '_beneficiaries' of WhitelistedCrowdsale.addAddressesToWhitelist (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#815) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_beneficiaries' of WhitelistedCrowdsale.removeAddressesFromWhitelist (/unique_chucks/27/0x7a80b57018b966bc1417af36a19551e289a51c33.sol#843-845) is not in mixedCase
